content: lion brand pattern # cja-babyset skill level easy level 2 jamie® baby article #870 *discontinued* 1700 yards *sport weight yarn can be substituted * blanket requires 1176 yards outfit requires 784 yards crochet hook - size i-9 1 yd 3/8 inches ribbon for hat 1 yd 1/4 ribbon for booties 3 small buttons for sweater set includes blanket sweater hat and booties blanket features crochet edging clothing features picot edging use picot edge as buttonholes clothing construction requires some sewing *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * the edging for the blanket has a small error it should read **edging** returning to chain foundation row join yarn and insert hook into space between first and 2nd sts of first row and work chain 2 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 single_crochet in that space \* 2dc ch2 1sc \* in next space repeat from \* to \* in each chain-2 space across first row
